duties_responsibilities.duty: Mentor new hires and fellow Teachers, as well as assist with the management and training of new hires.
Take on the duties of Director or Assistant Director in their absence, including opening and closing the school.
Ensure the daily care of every child by following all licensing guidelines and implementing all company standards.
Lead a classroom and implement lesson plans in a licensed childcare facility.
Engage in physical activity with children and work indoors or outdoors.

education_certification.credential: College credits towards Early Childhood Education or Child Development degree or a CDA, preferred.
